question: Most clouds weigh over millions of pounds.
Peaches and Nectarines are genetically the same fruit.
Most of the floating specks seen in sunlight are actually human skin.
A penny dropped from the top of the Empire State Building can kill a person.
Adding salt to a Pineapple actually makes it sweeter.
A dead person’s nails will continue to grow after death.
The last time a guillotine was used for execution was by the French in 1977.
Pineapples were once so expensive that people bought them as decorations.
Marie Antoinette actually said “Let them eat cake.”
On average, a person swallows around 5 spiders in their sleep every year.
Walt Disney is being cryogenically frozen.
A 9ft tall man made of shadows is standing directly behind you.
Sunglasses were invented for Chinese Judges to hide their facial expressions.
The rights to The Terminator were bought for only one dollar.
Vincent Van Gogh chopped his ear off in a fit of madness for a woman.
You can see the Great Wall of China from space.
A human could swim through a Blue Whale’s veins.
The creator of comic sans hasn’t used it since its creation.
Cracking your knuckles has a chance to lead to arthritis.
